dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Greetings, {activator.name}. I am {npc.name}, a priest of the elven god Llwyfen.
I'm also the mayor of Brynknot, and I'm currently attending to some business here in Greyton.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: I deeply appreciate you helping us get rid of that threat. If not for you, it is likely that Brynknot would have been overrun by the demons.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Greetings citizen. I'm the {npc.name}, the captain of the Brynknot Guards, and our duty as guards is to protect the citizens of Brynknot.
Be careful if you're going out of the city.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Welcome, welcome. We won't forget what you have done for Brynknot, {activator.name}.

part.name: A Strange Portal
part.message: You have found a portal sealed by the power of the elven god Llwyfen. Perhaps you should find a priest of Llwyfen to learn more.

response.message: I have found a portal sealed by the powers of Llwyfen.

dialog.name: sealedportal
dialog.message: Hmm... So you're saying you found a portal in Underground City that is sealed by the powers of the elven god Llwyfen, which I'm a priest of? That is the most unsettling news I have heard about that area recently...
If you like, I can give you an amulet that should break the seal, but please come back to me once you learn what's beyond that portal.

dialog.name: alright
dialog.message: Very well then. Take the amulet, and go investigate what's beyond that strange portal.

part.name: Investigation of the Portal
part.message: Maplevale, a priest of Llwyfen and the mayor of Brynknot, has asked you to investigate what's beyond the strange portal in Underground City and has given you an amulet of Llwyfen, which should allow you to pass through the portal.

item.name: Letter from Nyhelobo to oty captain

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: I have asked you to investigate the area beyond the strange portal that you told me about in the Underground City. Have you learned anything yet?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: I have asked you to investigate the area beyond the strange portal that you told me about in the Underground City. Have you learned anything yet?

dialog.name: foundnote
dialog.message: You hand over the note...
Hmm! This note is most troubling indeed.

Please go see Talthor Redeye, the captain of the Brynknot guards, immediately. I'll send a runner to explain the situation to him, but he'll likely have some orders for you. You should be able to find him in his office, above the guard barracks.

part.name: Talthor Redeye
part.message: You have delivered the note you found in the passage beyond the portal in Underground City to Maplevale. After reading it, Maplevale told you to go speak to Talthor Redeye, the captain of the Brynknot guards, immediately.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Time is of the essence. Please follow Talthor Redeye's orders. You should be able to find him in his office, above the guard barracks in Brynknot.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: So you're the adventurer Maplevale sent word of. The runner said that there are enemies beneath Brynknot, somewhere in the sewers, is that correct?

response.message: Yes, I found them through a portal in Underground City.

dialog.name: yesuc
dialog.message: Hmm. According to the information the mayor sent me, your description of the place beyond the portal matches that of a part of the Brynknot sewer system that has been sealed off. It leads to a maze-like part of the sewers, dug out by monsters, and not by humans. But I don't know who is responsible for all of this.

response.message: How can I get to that part of the sewers?

dialog.name: getto
dialog.message: Here, you'll need this key. The gate is sealed shut, but this key should still be able to open it.
Go through the portal once again, open the gate, and please find whoever is responsible for all this.

part.name: The Attack
part.message: Talthor Redeye has given you the key to the lower levels of Brynknot Sewers, and instructed you to find and kill whoever is responsible for the planned attack on Brynknot.

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you found whoever is responsible for the attack?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you found whoever is responsible for the attack?

response.message: Yes, the beholder Nyhelobo has been taken care of.

dialog.name: takencare
dialog.message: That's excellent news, {activator.name}.
You're not one of my guards, but you still deserve to be paid for your service. Who knows, if not for you, Brynknot might have been overrun by demons or worse... So, please accept this payment.
